Title: Relates to prevailing wages for certain New York city service contracts
Summary: Requires prevailing wages for New York city service contracts to provide homecare services, day care services, head start services, services to persons with cerebral palsy, building services, food services or temporary services; removes references to living wage.
LawCode: Amd ยง6-109, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prevailing wage for certain city service contracts
